attributes.action: stop the proposed building of a  hotel etc,where fleetwood pier was demolished
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is proposed to build a modern hotel,completely out of character with Fleetwoods  many listed buildings,it will be an eyesore diminish everybodys enjoyment of our unique vews and accessability and also we do not need this projected business on the sea front.
